title: Microsoft Stream: Viewing Teams meeting recording transcripts for DoD
description:
For Teams meeting recordings saved to OneDrive and SharePoint that were recorded with Teams Live Transcript, you'll be able to view the transcript from that meeting directly in the transcript pane next to the video player.
More info: https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/office/view-edit-and-manage-video-transcripts-and-captions-3cb9acb6-05b2-4f59-a50d-7df61123aa20
GA date: September CY2022
